Rabin, Anne Marie Stoppa, Ellen Meijer, Jean-Baptiste Mear, Sacha Zeerleder, Jiri Mayer, Roland Fenk, Nathalie Fegueux, Patrice Chevallier , Eva Konirova, John A. Snowden , Monika Engelhardt , Kim Orchard, Cyrille Hulin, Nicolaas Schaap, Claudia Sossa, Ahmet Elmaagacli, Donal P. McLornan , Patrick J. Hayden , Stefan Schönland and Ibrahim Yakoub-Agha

sections.text:
Correction: An early post-transplant relapse prediction score in multiple myeloma: a large cohort study from the chronic malignancies working party of EBMT Meral Beksac , Simona Iacobelli, Linda Koster, Jan Cornelissen, Laimonas Griskevicius, Neil K. Rabin, Anne Marie Stoppa, Ellen Meijer, Jean-Baptiste Mear, Sacha Zeerleder, Jiri Mayer, Roland Fenk, Nathalie Fegueux, Patrice Chevallier , Eva Konirova, John A. Snowden , Monika Engelhardt , Kim Orchard, Cyrille Hulin, Nicolaas Schaap, Claudia Sossa, Ahmet Elmaagacli, Donal P. McLornan , Patrick J. Hayden , Stefan Schönland and Ibrahim Yakoub-Agha
© The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer Nature Limited 2023
Bone Marrow Transplantation (2023) 58:1065; https://doi.org/10.1038/s41409-023-02014-3
Correction to: Bone Marrow Transplantation https://doi.org/ 10.1038/s41409-023-01999-1, published online 09 May 2023
In this article, the second affiliation of Claudia Sossa was missing. It should be Universidad Autónoma de Bucaramanga—UNAB, Bucaramanga, Santander, Colombia. The original article has been corrected.
Published online: 14 June 2023
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 () ;,:

title: Correction: An early post-transplant relapse prediction score in multiple myeloma: a large cohort study from the chronic malignancies working party of EBMT
